article_title: Chain (XCN) ignores the wider market downtrend by rallying 100%+ over the past month - Cointelegraph
text:
May was an incredibly challenging month for the cryptocurrency market as the majority of tokens booked heavy losses as a bear market was confirmed, but not every project dropped back to pre-bull market lows.

Chain (XCN), a protocol designed to help organizations launch their own blockchain network or connect with other more established networks, has managed to rally more than 120% since May 19.

Data from Cointelegraph Markets Pro and TradingView shows that since hitting a low of $0.0712 on May 11, XCN has reversed course to hit a record-high at $0.176 on May 31.

XCN/USDT 4-hour chart. Source: TradingView

The three reasons for the strong showing from XCN are multiple exchange listings, launching on BNB Chain and several notable partnerships, including a long-standing collaboration with the Stellar Foundation.

Exchange listings pump up the volume

In March 2022, Chain deployed a new smart contract for its token and rebranded from CHN to XCN. Following the rebrand, XCN listed on KuCoin and subsequent listings on Huobi, Gate.io, Bitrue and Hotbit were accompanied by sharp upticks in trading volume.

Several of the supporting exchanges have also launched perpetual contracts for the XCN token, including Gate.io, Huobi, Bybit and Poloniex, which has helped generate increased awareness for the project and initially led to a spike in trading volume.

XCN is also part of a cross-chain integration with BNB Chain, which enables inexpensive token transfers and trading on PancakeSwap, where holders can earn yield for providing liquidity to the exchange.

Following the integration with BNB Chain, the price of XCN rallied from $0.0712 on May 11 to $0.14 over the next week.

Related: BNB Chain releases year-long technical roadmap to develop ecosystem

Notable partnerships

Since 2014, Chain has had several notable partnerships and funding rounds, including an initial fundraise of over $40 million from Khosla Ventures, Pantera Capital, Capital One, Citigroup, Fiserv, Nasdaq, Orange and Visa.

In 2018, the project was acquired and became part of the commercial arm of the Stellar Foundation known as Interstellar. Chain was reacquired in 2020 as part of a ledger-as-a-service platform called Sequence.

It’s possible the recent developments with the Stellar protocol, including its partnership with MoneyGram to create a stablecoin-based platform for money transfers, could have positive effects on the price of XCN due to their close ties.

In April 2022, Chain also announced a strategic partnership with Alameda Research, which established the private equity and quantitative cryptocurrency trading firm as Chain’s primary market maker. While none of these partnerships appears significant enough to explain XCN’s current gains, it is notable that the altcoin’s price action has diverged from the wider crypto market for nearly an entire month.

The views and opinions expressed here are solely those of the author and do not necessarily reflect the views of Cointelegraph.com. Every investment and trading move involves risk, you should conduct your own research when making a decision.

article_title: Developers Raise Over $300 Million With NFTs - Virtual Land Sale for Otherside Drives Up Ethereum Gas Prices - CoinCodex
text:
Key highlights:

The sale of Otherdeeds NFTs, which will allow users to claim virtual land in the Otherside metaverse, brought in more than $300 million

The project is headed by Yuga Labs, the team behind Bored Ape Yacht Club

The massive demand for the sale resulted in extremely high gas prices on Ethereum, and Yuga Labs says "it seems abundantly clear" that ApeCoin will need to migrate to its own chain

Bored Ape Yacht Club creators strike gold with Otherside virtual land sale

Otherside, a metaverse project by Bored Ape Yacht Club (BAYC) creators Yuga Labs, sold out 55,000 virtual land NFTs in the space of three hours. The NFTs, which are called Otherdeeds, will make it possible for their owners to claim virtual land in the Otherside metaverse.

Currently, details about the Otherside metaverse are scarce. According to the project’s website, the virtual world will incorporate mechanics from both MMORPGs and “web3-enabled virtual worlds”. The virtual world will leverage technology provided by Improbable, a company specialized in software solutions for virtual worlds and metaverses. Per the website, this will allow Otherside to support more than 10,000 concurrent players in a single virtual place, and incorporate physics and AI capabilities into the game.

The currency accepted in the NFT sale was ApeCoin (APE), a token that was launched in March. The token grants governance access in the ApeCoin DAO, and it’s being adopted by Yuga Labs as the currency of choice for their projects. The price to mint an Otherdeeds NFT was 305 APE, which translated to around $5,800 when minting was open. Minting the NFTs was only available for users who completed a know your customer (KYC) check.

Demand for the sale resulted drove up gas prices on the Ethereum blockchain

The overwhelming demand for the NFT sale resulted in a massive gas price spike, temporarily making the Ethereum network extremely expensive to use. According to data from Etherscan, the average gas price on May 1 was 474.5 Gwei, compared to 52.5 Gwei on April 30 and 72 Gwei on May 2. In addition to spending around $317 million worth of ApeCoin to pay for the Otherdeed NFTs, buyers spent $180 million ETH in total on transaction fees. A number of users also dealt with failed transactions when trying to mint the NFTs.

The May 1 spike in the average gas price caused by the Otherdeeds NFT mint. Image source: Etherscan

In total, there will be 200,000 Otherdeeds NFTs. In addition to the 55,000 NFTs offered for purchase on May 1, 45,000 NFTs can be claimed by owners of Bored Ape Yacht Club and Mutant Ape Yacht Club NFTs. 15,000 Otherdeeds NFTs will be going to Yuga Labs and other developers associated with the project, and the remaining 85,000 NFTs will be distributed to Otherdeeds owners.

Yuga Labs commented on the controversies surrounding the mint, saying that they will be refunding the gas paid by users who had failed transactions. Notably, the team says “it seems abundantly clear” that ApeCoin will require its own blockchain platform to meet the project’s scaling demands and encouraged the ApeCoin DAO “to start thinking in this direction”.

We're sorry for turning off the lights on Ethereum for a while. It seems abundantly clear that ApeCoin will need to migrate to its own chain in order to properly scale. We'd like to encourage the DAO to start thinking in this direction. — Yuga Labs (@yugalabs) May 1, 2022

Currently, the floor price of the Otherdeeds collection on OpenSea is 3.7 ETH, which translates to about $10,500.

article_title: The User Experience of Futures Trading on Three Crypto Exchanges - Cryptonews
text:
The User Experience of Futures Trading on Three Crypto Exchanges

Disclaimer: The text below is an advertorial article that was not written by Cryptonews.com journalists.

Before we get started, let’s first check the background information: As a beginner investor who has just joined the crypto sector and tried entry-level products like spot trading on several exchanges, I now plan to venture into the futures market and earn more profits by trading futures. Today, let’s check out how I opened a futures position on three crypto exchanges (Binance, KuCoin, and CoinEx) and see which platform provides the best functions (PS: personal experience & for reference only).

I. Binance

Let’s begin with the futures segment of Binance, which primarily covers crypto futures that include USDT-M Futures (linear contracts), Coin-M Futures (inverse contracts), Binance Leveraged Tokens, and Binance Options. More specifically, users can trade USDT-M Futures and Coin-M Futures directly on the Binance webpage. To trade Binance Options, however, investors must also download the Binance app. As for Binance Leveraged Tokens, since there are no operating guides, novices who are not familiar with leveraged tokens might get confused at the very beginning.

Here, I went with USDT-M Futures and entered the BTC/USDT futures market. As shown in the picture below, the left side of the page shows the current market conditions and the order book, while users can select the margin model and order type on the right side of the page. On Binance, users can place 7 types of orders, including Limit, Market, Stop Limit, etc., and choose to buy long or sell short. After opening a position, they can check open orders and trade history at the bottom of the page.

It should be noted that users must go through KYC authentication before trading futures on Binance. Moreover, to get started with Binance products & services (e.g. crypto deposits, trades, and withdrawals), both old and new users must first complete KYC authentication.

Overall, as a world-leading crypto exchange, Binance offers a full range of crypto futures and a well-designed webpage. However, there are no operating guides, and users need to spend extra time learning how to trade futures on the exchange. At the same time, to trade futures on Binance, users must complete KYC authentication. Additionally, they should also be careful with the platform as it faced many user rights protection issues, including manipulation of the candlestick chart and malicious liquidation of positions.

II. KuCoin

KuCoin’s crypto contract segment now features futures contracts and leveraged tokens. The futures page of KuCoin is pretty similar to that of Binance — the current market conditions and order book are on the left, and the margin model and order type are on the right. Meanwhile, KuCoin also provides a wide range of functions, ranging from the Contract Calculator to Take Profit & Stop Loss. However, on KuCoin, traders can only place limit/stop orders.

KuCoin only provides less than 100 USDT-margined futures markets, which indicates a lack of diversity. In addition, USD 280 million worth of assets were stolen from KuCoin in September 2020, which marked the biggest crypto hack that year. Therefore, before joining KuCoin, investors should carefully examine the platform’s security.

III. CoinEx

On CoinEx, all crypto contracts are futures. Users can trade linear/inverse contracts (the equivalent of USDT-M Futures and Coin-M Futures on Binance and KuCoin ). Users can click on [Futures] in the navigation bar to start trading futures.

The futures page of CoinEx is simple and straightforward, with clear-cut segments. Unlike Binance or KuCoin, CoinEx offers four types of futures: limit orders, market orders, stop-limit orders, and stop-market orders. It should also be noted that CoinEx placed the Futures Tutorial on the top of order settings to help users learn how to trade futures by simply watching the tutorial video and completing the quiz. The Futures Tutorial allows users to get started with futures trading on CoinEx quickly and conveniently.

CoinEx also offers functions like TP & SL and a contract calculator. Moreover, the platform allows users to close positions with one click. Overall, CoinEx’s futures page is more straightforward than that of Binance or KuCoin, and is easier on the eye. Additionally, CoinEx does not require futures traders to go through KYC authentication, which is more convenient for people like me who do not plan on completing any KYC authentication anytime soon. To open a position and start trading futures on CoinEx, users only have to log in to their CoinEx account and transfer assets into the futures account.

It is worth mentioning that CoinEx has always been noted as an extremely secure platform in the industry. The exchange has never been hacked in the past 5 years since its inception. As a reassuring exchange, CoinEx is backed by strong products & technologies, as well as enhanced asset security.

In conclusion, after comparing the futures provided by the three platforms, Binance provides a comprehensive, professional futures segment that features a large number of markets but requires KYC authentication, which is bad news for beginner traders or users in a country/region where KYC authentication is not allowed. In addition, Binance has suffered many scandals. On the other hand, futures products provided by KuCoin and CoinEx are both beginner-friendly, with a full range of basic functions and easy operations. Yet when it comes to security and ease of use, CoinEx is the obvious winner.

article_title: BitMEX Expands its Crypto Trading Offering with Spot Exchange - CoinCodex
text:
Key takeaways:

Popular crypto derivatives exchange BitMEX has launched spot markets

Users can buy and sell BTC, ETH, APE, UNI, MATIC, LINK, and AXS in USDT trading pairs

BitMEX is celebrating the launch of its spot exchange platform with a $1 million giveaway and BMEX token reward promotion

The BitMEX Spot exchange goes live, BMEX token coming soon

BitMEX, one of the most popular cryptocurrency derivatives trading platforms, has expanded its suite of trading products and services with the launch of the BitMEX Spot exchange. The exchange currently supports seven cryptocurrencies, including BTC, ETH, APE, UNI, MATIC, LINK, and AXS. According to a blog post, additional digital currencies, including BitMEX’s own BMEX token, are “due to arrive in the coming months.”

The leading crypto derivatives exchange first announced plans to provide its users with exposure to physical digital assets in April. At the time, the company also revealed it is looking to launch brokerage and crypto custody services as well as secure additional regulatory licenses.

BitMEX Spot exchange allows users to place market and limit orders, depending on their preference and trading precision requirements. All digital currencies included in the offering can be traded in trading pairs with Tether’s USDT. BitMEX maker and taker trading fees start at 0.10% and can go as low as 0.00% for the largest volume traders on the platform.

The company is celebrating the launch of spot markets with a two-month-long Sweepstakes promotion with a prize pool of over $1 million. Users will be able to earn crypto rewards and various merchandise depending on their trading volume. In addition, BitMEX is granting the first 10,000 newly verified depositors a chance to earn up to 20 BMEX. Moreover, additional BMEX token rewards will be distributed among the first 10,000 users to trade spot pairs on BitMEX.

Founded in 2014, BitMEX was at one point the largest crypto derivatives platform in the sector. However, the rise of competitors like Binance Futures, Deribit, Bybit, and FTX, as well as BitMEX’s own regulatory troubles, saw the company’s market share dwindle. Earlier this year, BitMEX hired a new CEO Alexander Höptner to lead the company’s “transformation from a crypto derivatives exchange to something bigger.”

BitMEX has handled more than $830 million in trading volume over the last 24 hours, with XBTUSD Bitcoin perpetual futures contract accounting for nearly three-quarters of the exchange’s entire trading volume.

Open BitMEX Account

article_title: How to Earn 15% Interest on Your UST Holdings with Flexible Staking on Bybit? - CoinCodex
text:
Cryptocurrency investors often wonder how to make the most out of their cryptocurrency holdings. Some people try to time the markets with an active trading strategy, or even trade cryptocurrency futures with leverage. Active trading strategies introduce additional risks, and many crypto investors prefer a more passive approach. Thankfully, there’s plenty of ways to passively grow your cryptocurrency holdings while keeping risks relatively low. One of the most popular ways to generate passive income with crypto is staking.

Staking is a passive way of earning rewards on your crypto holdings

If you hold a cryptocurrency that’s secured through Proof-of-Stake, you can stake or delegate your coins directly on the blockchain and earn staking rewards in return. Alternatively, you can use staking services offered by cryptocurrency exchanges. These services also make it possible for you to stake crypto assets like Bitcoin, which don’t utilize a Proof-of-Stake consensus mechanism.

The Bybit cryptocurrency exchange offers a Flexible Savings product allows users to stake their cryptocurrency and earn yield on it. The yields are expressed as APY (annual percentage year), which shows how much interest would be earned if the coins were staked for one year. For example, if you staked 1,000 coins in a Flexible Savings with an APY of 5%, you would earn 50 coins if you held the stake for a year.

There is a broad selection of assets supported on Flexible Savings, including low market cap altcoins, major coins like Bitcoin and Ethereum, and stablecoins. The APYs can vary greatly depending on the staked asset—as a general rule, we can say that more established crypto assets offer lower staking yields, but this isn’t always the case.

Some staking programs require users to lock up their cryptocurrency for a specified period of time. This is not the case with Flexible Savings on Bybit, as users are free to unstake their crypto at any time.

How to stake UST and earn rewards on Bybit?

In this article, we’ll be going through the process of staking the TerraUSD (UST) stablecoin in Bybit’s Flexible Savings product. At the time of writing, Bybit is offering a 15% APY on UST staked in Flexible Savings. Most of what we will be covering in this guide applies to all the coins that can be staked on Flexible Savings, so you can get some valuable insights even if you’re looking to stake another coin.

Before we continue with our step-by-step guide, we should mention that some Flexible Savings programs on Bybit are only offered for a limited time. Depending on when you’re reading this guide, it’s possible that the program featured in the guide is no longer available, or that the staking rewards have changed. Check the official Bybit website to see the most up-to-date rates and coins supported for Flexible Savings.

Step-by-step guide

Before you get started, you’ll have to create an account on Bybit. Bybit is a popular cryptocurrency exchange that offers a full suite of cryptocurrency services, including spot and derivatives trading, passive income products, token sales and more.

Create Bybit Account

You will also have to get your hands on some UST. If you already own UST, you can simply deposit it to Bybit. Of course, you can also use Bybit to purchase UST—you can check out our guide explaining how to buy crypto on Bybit.

How to buy cryptocurrency on Bybit?

1. Transfer UST to your Earn account

Once you have some UST on Bybit, you will have to transfer it to your Spot account to your Earn account if you want to use it in Flexible Savings. Go to your spot account, click “Transfer” and enter the amount you wish to transfer. Internal transfers between your Bybit accounts are instant and free.

After the transfer is complete, you can check the balance in your Earn account. If you click the “Earn” button, you’ll be taken to an overview of the different passive income products offered by Bybit.

2. Find the UST Flexible Savings program

In this example, the Flexible Savings program for UST is already featured in the “Trending” section. If you can’t find it here, click on the “Flexible Savings” tab. Click the “Buy Now” button to proceed.

3. Stake your UST

In the confirmation window, you can see the overview of the staking, including the estimated daily yield. To stake, click on Stake Now.

Congratulations, you’ve successfully staked 100 UST with a 15% APY!

4. Track your staking progress or unstake your UST

If you want to track the progress of your UST stake and the yield you’ve earned so far, you’ll need to navigate to the “Flexible Staking” subsection of your Earn account. If you wish to stop staking your UST, you can click on “Unstake”. The Flexible Savings product allows you to unstake your staked coins at any time.

Additional considerations

While staking on cryptocurrency exchanges like Bybit is a relatively safe way to grow your cryptocurrency holdings, every earning opportunity comes with certain risks. In the case of staking programs like Flexible Savings, the biggest risk is that you have to trust the exchange to handle the staked coins responsibly. Cryptocurrency exchanges are an attractive target for hackers, and your coins could be stolen in a security breach. You also have to take steps to appropriately secure your account with a strong password, 2-factor authentication and other means.

Staking cryptocurrency will grow your crypto holdings—in other words, you will end up with more coins than you began with. However, this doesn’t necessarily mean that the value of your investment will grow. If the price of the coin you’re staking drops, the overall value of your investment could decrease even though you earned additional coins through staking. This isn’t really a problem if you are staking stablecoins (assuming they maintain their peg), but should be a consideration if you’re looking to stake other types of cryptocurrency.

The bottom line

Bybit’s Flexible Savings product is a convenient and low-risk way of passively growing your cryptocurrency holdings. The product offers attractive yields and supports a wide variety of cryptocurrencies, including stablecoins. If you don’t plan on actively trading your cryptocurrencies, it’s certainly worth considering staking them in Flexible Savings on Bybit. Hopefully, this guide helped you get started with earning yield on your UST.

article_title: Building a Launchpad for Crypto Projects - Interview With Infinity Rocket (IRT) Project Founders - CoinCodex
text:
The Infinity Rocket community members ask plenty of questions in chats. Usually, the most interesting thing for them is news that can move markets for the IRT token. We talked to the project's founders to learn valuable information about the Infinity Rocket platform and the IRT token.

The IRT token smart-contract was released on September 17th, 2021. Today it is traded on PancakeSwap, Coinsbit and Bitrue. The trading volume is about $2 million daily. How do you rate the “flight” of your rocket after 8 months?

As far as you can see, we have an astronaut on our logo, it’s our mascot. If we go on speaking about the project in the “space” language then since the very beginning our spaceship has entered the right orbit and sticks to the given plan. Seriously though, we are proud that all the iRocket Road Map goals are done despite all the storms. Our team proves its efficiency under any circumstances.

What turned out easier to deal with and what made you work harder?

Every single project has its own character. Even if you have created and launched dozens of tokens to crypto exchanges you need to adapt to each of them. However, the unsolvable problems do not appear. We have a really coordinated team so we are always taking higher goals to develop. The tempo we have maintained for 8 months proves it right. We appreciate the new challenges, the dynamics. It is urgent to stay focused.

The marketing experts say that a unique proposition is necessary to succeed. What makes the Infinity Rocket Launchpad Platform special?

That is a good question. This is one of our favorite points of discussion “Who are you?” and “What do you do to change the World?”. We are working on the full cycle platform that should contain the startups and the blockchain professionals, also traders.

We are working on the service that allows to walk the safe way from the idea to the token launch on the biggest international exchanges. We are creating the product we would doubtlessly use ourselves when we were launching our first tokens.

Could you tell us about your current team?

The sense of any structure is formed by the core. This very core of the Infinity Rocket team consists of professional traders, IT-architects and programmers, marketing experts. Such projects can not exist without these specialists. Furthermore, we have lawyers, social media specialists and web-developers who work on separate tasks.

By the way, all of us are crypto-enthusiasts as we were one of the first to work in this sphere since its establishment. Now our international team core numbers 12 people.

There are several companies that follow the strategy of full publicity. Their founders are public figures, they speak at different conferences. They also publish their private photos on social media. You hold a different point of view—could you tell us more about it?

All of us were public figures with boosted accounts and a resume. Although united by the idea and aspiration of making a great project we do not focus on promoting all of the team members. We are focused on our business. Some of us continue working officially for the huge international companies at the high positions. The project has its officials, legal address and company. But let me get that straight we appreciate privacy and anonymity, we even mentioned it on our website. Moreover, we respect our partners’ and clients’ privacy rights and they are grateful for this.

We can frequently come across the information about the project advisors from the CryptoMaximum company in your posts. What do they do?

We have been cooperating for a long time with the CryptoMaximum group since blockchain conferences. They develop trading and market making areas in our project. The professional impact in this sphere is rather important. Also, we hold some marketing activities in the CryptoMaximum community to promote the IRT token.

What perspectives does IRT have this summer? Surely, everyone is waiting for the rockets and new Xes. What can we expect?

Right, everyone loves insider information. When being traders we also learnt to read between the lines. Now we are ready to announce some most important upcoming events.

Soon there will be a new listing on a big exchange (TOP 20) and a great promotion. This will bring additional attention to our token and expand our community.

Also, we are going to demonstrate the beta-version of some service products for launchpad and new projects promotion. This product is unique and we are its authors. To estimate the platform functions we are going to form a focus-group from the most active members of our community.

The project is developing rapidly and the IRT chart is the proof of our professional input.

On May 23rd, 2022 you burnt 1% of the project tokens. How did it influence the price and why was it necessary?

Burning is an instrument that allows you to manage the number of tokens in circulation. This process leads to the price increase of tokens in circulation. This is a benefit for investors. For the project this process is some kind of an activity growth driver, a powerful stimulus of product added value increase.

Until 2030 we will have burnt no less than 30% of tokens and, as for the whole living cycle of the product, we will burn 50% of all the tokens in circulation. Every integration will be followed by some massive PR-campaigns, new functional product blocks launching to save and increase the Infinity Rocket capitalization growth.

Let us speak about the chart. How can you describe the nature of the IRT token price movement?

The token price surely shows an uptrend since its launch. The previous events on the market in May 2022 illustrated that our token did not renew the minimums during some tough periods. We are working hard every day to maintain this confident growth tendency because the token price increase and the community expansion are related to the realization of our plans.

When the trading started on September 23rd in 2021 on PancakeSwap the token cost 0.00035 USD and reached 0.05 USD within a month and a half, the increase was more than 14,000%. The number of token holders have reached 14,000 at the moment which shows the trust level of the community.

What advice can you give to the investors?

Probably, it will not sound unique but there is an important criteria of choosing the project for investing. “You should always rate the idea, the product and the team”. Most important are distant things: the results, plan executions, reaching the goals and the active work on the product.

However, if you enter some great project at a high price, you should be ready to lose some money, especially for a short period of time. That is why when you choose wisely and rate the fundamental characteristics you gain more than hype assets trade.

Remember: a long-term investor earns more than a short-term trader. However, you should take your time. If you want to make a long-term investment, you should choose high qualified projects. Nobody is a good investor in the beginning of his path. What forms the professionalism is persistence, constant self-educating and the experience of overcoming the obstacles.

Good luck! Join us, we will be glad to communicate.

article_title: FIREPIN Token (FRPN) Competes With The Popularity of Meme Coins Such as Samoyedcoin (SAMO) and Floki Inu (FLOKI) - CoinCodex
text:
Cryptocurrencies are usually equated to stocks to put the concept of blockchain into perspective. The cryptocurrencies, in addition to being investment opportunities, also function as products that require to be backed by functional features, marketing and customer (investor, in this case) satisfaction.

The best marketing that happens for cryptocurrencies always unfurls on the internet and social media. These platforms are efficiently harnessed by meme coins to grip on to popularity.

What Are Meme Coins?

Meme coins are usually created as a tribute to a meme, which is a humorous notion captured in an image, video, or another medium. Meme coins, like the memes they're based on, are intended to go viral and be shared. Unlike other tokens, such cryptocurrencies are not oriented toward problem-solving. Since it is dependent on the endorsement of influencers, community activities, excitement, and FOMO, the value of a meme currency swings with market interest.

Several crypto tokens emerged as meme coins and have performed well in the market. Certain examples would be Shiba Inu (SHIB), Floki Inu (FLOKI), Dogecoin (DOGE), Samoyedcoin (SAMO), etc.

As one may expect, Samoyedcoin (SAMO) is another dog-themed cryptocurrency that has now partnered with Solana (SOL). According to a statement by Samoyedcoin itself, "at its core, SAMO is an emerging digital asset that backs a community concentrated on onboarding Solana users". Furthermore, SAMO is designed to create scarcity for its coin. Since its establishment, it has completed three burns. In its tokenomics, oversupply is one of the main areas that SAMO intends to tackle.

Can Investing In Meme Coin Backfire?

Unlike most crypto tokens or fiat currencies, meme coins frequently have an unlimited supply which means their availability is limitless which further leads to high volatility in their value.

From legal troubles in the United Kingdom to a recent reduction in interest in meme coins, the price of Floki Inu has dropped by 90% in 2022. Floki Inu (FLOKI) emerged as Dogecoin's and Shiba Inu's most serious challenger. However, its aggressive marketing techniques have spelled bad news for it. Floki Inu recently announced a new marketing campaign that states that the cryptocurrency will be advertised on 100 buses and 203 posters will be placed around London's metro stations. The crypto's efforts to build a decentralised monetary fund have already angered UK legislators. The new campaign aspires to become a spokesperson for all meme coins but is facing friction from authoritative figures.

It is instances like these which remind the investors how tricky it is to trust meme coins that are constantly swayed by whimsical controversies and unforeseen trends on the internet.

The Marketing Technique of Firepin (FRPN)

The best marketing tool that FIREPIN Token (FRPN) has adopted is its well-constructed whitepaper. FIREPIN Token (FRPN) is a new entry into the crypto market and has some promising features which are actively being noticed by analysts. It offers an NFT platform where subdivisions of NFT can be traded for the maximum profit within the holistic FIREPIN Metaverse. It is also a DAO token that rewards the investors with decision-making powers and creates space for a democratic financial investment.

FIREPIN Token (FRPN) is in its presale phase which makes right now the perfect opportunity to invest at a discounted price and reap bigger benefits in the future.

article_title: Project Galaxy Officially Announces the Launch of Their GAL Token - Yahoo Finance
text:
San Francisco, California--(Newsfile Corp. - May 18, 2022) - Project Galaxy protocol began over one year ago and has seen significant growth having successfully onboarded over 383 partners and 1.6 million users which were critical in developing the ecosystem and driving global acceptance. Today, they announced Project Galaxy DAO and its native governance token GAL, a multi-chain token built on both the Ethereum mainnet and the Binance smart chain. The GAL token can be traded on Binance, Coinbase, Kucoin and other tier 1 CEX's and DEX's including Pancake Swap.





Gal Token



To view an enhanced version of this graphic, please visit:

https://orders.newsfilecorp.com/files/8203/123960_gal.ht1.jpg

Project Galaxy has a unique ecosystem that allows Web3 developers and projects to leverage digital credential data and NFTs to build better products and communities. By contributing to Galaxy’s Credential Data Network, curators are rewarded with GAL when credentials are used in Galaxy’s Application Modules, Credential Oracle Engine, and Credential API. The main 4 features of Project Galaxy Application Modules include OAT, Galaxy NFT, Galaxy Vote, and Galaxy ID.

"We began this project with a vision of what we believed would be a game-changer, and have spent the last year building on that vision, and today we are extremely proud and excited to announce that we are finally launching our native token, the GAL token, and we are so grateful for the community that has grown with us this far, and for being a great support system for our team, we are excited to share more big announcements over this year," stated the co-founder of Project Galaxy, Charles Wayne.

The Project Galaxy token, GAL, will offer a significant number of benefits to the token holders such as a payment for the Project Galaxy ecosystem which includes Credential Oracle Engine, and Credential API for developers to leverage credential data to build better products and communities.

Story continues

GAL is Project Galaxy's native utility and governance token, it offers three main features for the token holder:

Governance: GAL token holders can vote on Project Galaxy DAO's governance proposals.

Paying for Fees: Developers who aim to utilize Galaxy's credential data will be charged in GAL.

Curating Credentials: Curators are incentivized to stake GAL tokens to signal a credential data set's value.

About Project Galaxy

Project Galaxy is the largest Web3 credential data network in the world. Built on open and collaborative infrastructure, Project Galaxy helps developers and organizations leverage NFTs and digital credential data to build better products and communities in Web3. article_title: FreshCut (FCD) on Bybit Launchpool - Earn FCD by Staking BIT or FCD - CoinCodex
text:
Bybit has announced that FreshCut (FCD) will be the next project featured on Bybit Launchpool. Bybit Launchpool is a product by the Bybit cryptocurrency exchange that allows users to earn tokens from exciting blockchain projects simply by staking tokens. Depending on the specific Launchpool, users can earn rewards in one or multiple different tokens. For the FreshCut Launchpool program, Bybit users can earn FCD tokens by staking BIT or FCD. Larger BIT stakes earn higher rewards – the rewards you receive depend on how large your BIT or FCD stake is compared to the size of the entire BIT or FCD staking pool.

Bybit Launchpool is a low-risk way of earning some extra tokens from new and exciting blockchain projects. This is because you don’t need to spend any tokens in order to get the rewards, and you can unstake the staked tokens at any time.

Bybit will distribute 2,625,000 FCD tokens through its Launchpool. The program is taking place between 10AM UTC on May 10, 2022 to 1PM UTC on May 19, 2022.

Who is eligible for the FreshCut Launchpool on Bybit?

There are two criteria users must meet before they can earn FCD tokens on Bybit Launchpool. You need to have completed KYC Level 1 verification on Bybit, and have at least 100 BIT or 1,000 FCD tokens to stake. The maximum amount of BIT tokens that can be staked in the FreshCut Launchpool program is 30,000 BIT or 300,000 FCD. You can find up-to-date rules about FreshCut on Bybit Launchpool here.

How to earn FCD tokens on Bybit Launchpool?

Now that we’ve gone through the most important facts about FreshCut on Bybit Launchpool, let’s go through the step-by-step process for how you can participate and earn FCD rewards. The first step is to register an account on Bybit.

Create Bybit Account

Once your Bybit account is ready to go, you’ll have to complete the KYC Level 1 identity verification process. You can do so by going to the “Account & Security” section of your Bybit profile and selecting “Verify Now” under the “Identity Verification” tab. Follow the instructions provided by the exchange.

If you don’t already have BIT or FCD tokens in your Bybit account, you’ll have to deposit them to the exchange or purchase them on Bybit. The minimum amount of BIT that you can stake for the FreshCut program on Bybit Launchpool is 100 BIT, while the minimum for FCD stakers is 1,000 FCD.

How to buy cryptocurrency on Bybit?

Once your account is verified and you hold the minimum amount of BIT, you’re ready to start earning FCD tokens on Bybit Launchpool. Select “Launchpool” under the “Earn” section of the Bybit interface.

You will see the list of active pools on Bybit Launchpool. In this example, we can see that there are two staking pools for BIT and FCD, respectively.

Select “Stake Now” and enter the amount of BIT or FCD tokens that you want to stake. Make sure to familiarize yourself with Bybit’s terms of service before continuing.

Please note that the screenshot provided below is from a previous staking promotion on Bybit Launchpool. However, the same principles apply to the staking pools for earning FCD rewards.

You will receive the FCD tokens you earn in your ByFi Account, which you can view under the “Assets” tab. If you want to check the rewards you’ve earned or want to unstake your BIT, you can go to ByFi Account → Orders → Launchpool.

How are rewards calculated?

There’s a few things we need to point out when it comes to earning rewards on Bybit Launchpool. Here’s how Bybit explains the way daily rewards are calculated:

Let’s assume that you’ve staked token α to earn a new token β:

Your daily yield for β = (the amount of α you’ve staked to the α pool / total number of α staked to the α pool by the all participants) * daily β prize pool

Your rewards will start being calculated one day after you staked your BIT tokens. The daily rewards will be deposited into your ByFi Account once a day.

The bottom line

Bybit Launchpool is a useful product that will be especially attractive to BIT token holders. Through Launchpool, users can get their hands on new and exciting tokens without taking on any additional risks. Typically, the tokens you earn on Bybit Launchpool get listed on the Bybit exchange shortly after the Launchpool program concludes, which means that you can sell your rewards or purchase additional tokens. The 100 BIT minimum is also quite low, so Bybit Launchpool staking is accessible to almost everyone.

article_title: Elon Musk Features Bored Ape Yacht Club NFTs in New Twitter Profile Picture - CoinCodex
text:
Key highlights:

Elon Musk's new Twitter profile picture featuring images of NFTs from the Bored Ape Yacht Club collection

It's unlikely that Musk actually owns the NFTs featured in the image, as it appears to have been sourced from the website of auction house Sotheby's

Musk also posted a tweet that could be interpreted as a humorous jab at NFTs

Elon Musk features Bored Ape Yacht Club NFTs in Twitter profile picture

Tesla and SpaceX CEO Elon Musk has changed his Twitter profile picture to a collage featuring images of Bored Ape Yacht Club (BAYC) non-fungible tokens NFTs.

The NFT featured in the centre of the image is of BAYC #5809, which is owned by an address that has multiple other NFTs from the collection, as well as an assortment of other NFTs from collections like Otherdeeds.

Elon Musk's new profile picture features Bored Ape Yacht Club NFTs. Image source: Twitter

By itself, the fact that BAYC #5809 is featured prominently in Elon Musk’s new Twitter profile picture isn’t an indication that Musk owns the NFT. In fact, the image appears to be sourced from the website of the Sotheby’s auction house, and features BAYC NFTs that were auctioned off in a lot for $24.39 million by BAYC creators Yuga Labs.

Musk doesn't appear to be a big fan of NFTs

In addition to changing his profile picture, Musk also posted a tweet saying “I dunno … seems kinda fungible”, which could be interpreted as a humorous jab at NFTs. Critics and skeptics often make fun of NFTs by saving and reposting images of NFTs on platforms like Twitter, ostensibly to show that the images represented by NFTs can easily be copied and redistributed by anyone.

I dunno … seems kinda fungible — Elon Musk (@elonmusk) May 4, 2022

From what we know so far, it seems that Musk isn’t exactly a fan of NFTs. In a tweet posted in January, Musk called Twitter’s NFT profile picture feature “annoying”. In a subsequent tweet, Musk questioned why Twitter was using its engineering resources on the feature while the platform was facing a serious problem with spam bots.

Regardless of what Musk’s intentions behind the new profile picture might be, his move is sure to stir up discussion and speculation about BAYC and NFTs in general. ApeCoin (APE), a token closely associated with the BAYC ecosystem, displayed a quick price spike in response to the news. The APE price jumped by around 19% in the space of an hour, but has since corrected from a local peak at $17.40 to about $15.42 at the time of writing.

Yuga Labs recently raised more than $300 million by selling 55,000 Otherdeeds NFTs, which represent claims to virtual land in the Otherside metaverse. Demand for the sale, which was conducted exclusively with ApeCoin, was so high that transaction fees on the Ethereum blockchain temporarily increased to extreme levels. In Otherside, holders of NFTs from collections like BAYC will be able to use their NFTs as avatars. Bored Ape Yacht Club and Mutant Ape Yacht Club NFT holders can claim Otherdeeds for free (except for applicable gas fees).

article_title: How dApps Built on NEAR Protocol Change the Way the Digital Money Flows - CoinCodex
text:
How dApps Built on NEAR Protocol Change the Way the Digital Money Flows

The NEAR Protocol is a proof-of-stake (PoS) powered protocol and Ethereum competitor that enables developers to build decentralized applications (dApps). While the projects on offer through the NEAR Protocol might resemble those on Ethereum and other dApp-focused platforms, NEAR solves the problem of scalability.

Through its PoS consensus method, NEAR ensures that dApps built on its platform can harness the power of thousands of transactions per second without charging exorbitant fees at the same time. Such capabilities increase the likelihood of dApps that require smaller, more frequent transactions like games, as users won’t have to pay hefty fees for every interaction.

By streamlining and lowering the cost of transactions on its protocol, NEAR is changing the way digital money flows, creating a barrier-free way for users to make, save, and move money around.

Now, let’s take a look at some of the most exciting and innovative dApps developers are building on NEAR, and how they’re serving users in ways unlike before.

Spin.fi

Spin.fi is a decentralized exchange that combines the offerings provided by both centralized and decentralized platforms.

For instance, users can earn passive income by providing liquidity to various protocols, while traders might appreciate instant, low-fee transactions and order book matching. For their efforts, users earn some of Spin’s different tokens that they can then use to trade or stake within the platform.

Such capabilities are only possible within the NEAR platform thanks to its PoS consensus that supports hundreds of near-instant transactions with minimal fees.

Roketo

Roketo is a crypto financial streaming service that allows companies to automate their payroll and process payments in real-time. It changes the nature of financial transactions as it allows one to allocate funds transparently over large periods of time.

Streams take less than one minute to set up, can be paused and resumed at any time, and can be shared publicly. On top of the payroll, the service works great for vesting tokens, airdrops, and pay-per-minute services such as music or video streaming. With NEAR’s commissions of less than $1, recipients can withdraw their funds as easily as they do with fiat money.

Pulse Markets

Pulse Markets is a Web 3 prediction market aiming to fix the issues of current prediction markets, in that many traditional ones retain access to users’ funds while selling their personal information.

Pulse enables anyone to establish a prediction market based on whatever assets or market they’d like, utilizing a unique decentralized oracle infrastructure to pull price feeds and other information from the real world. Transactions are near-instant and cost next to nothing, thanks to the power of NEAR.

NearPay

NearPay is the first NEAR Protocol-supported debit card that links fiat and crypto. The project comes in the form of a digital app and a physical card. Aslo, NearPay provides a widget that allows merchants to integrate support of the NEAR Protocol and other crypto, so users can spend their hard-earned tokens on real-world goods.

While the project’s first cards are releasing in Europe, they plan to expand on a global scale in due time.

NearPad

NearPad considers itself NEAR’s DeFi hub, featuring a DEX and a LaunchPad for developers to build their dApps and list their tokens for trade.

By offering one space for users to build and harness the power of dApps, NearPad facilitates innovation within its ecosystem while ensuring all trades and transactions cost next to nothing, thanks to NEAR Protocol’s capabilities.

NEAR Crowd

NEAR Crowd is a dApp providing users with passive income for taking on and completing small requests made by the community. For example, a user creates a task asking others to describe what is in an image. Another user will take that task and complete it. However, for that user to get paid for their efforts, others must validate that the task was completed correctly.

If a user completes the task correctly, according to the reviewer, both they and the user who did the task earn NEAR for their efforts. The idea is for users to earn passive income for helping out others in their spare time, incentivizing productivity and teamwork.

Such a project focuses on the smaller transactions in the digital realm, ensuring users can pay one another for services no matter how diminutive.

Conclusion

The NEAR protocol provides developers with more ways to manage the flow of digital funds than ever before while minimizing the cost of transactions. NEAR processes are also near-instant, minimizing the wait time for users to take advantage of such benefits.

article_title: Why gaming crypto platform MOBOX (MBOX) volume soared 124%? - Kalkine Media
text:
Highlights MOBOX is a gaming platform and metaverse creator that combines DeFi and Gaming NFTs in its play-to-earn ecosystem.

MBOX is its native token used as in-game currency, governance token, and for staking to receive MOMO NFT Mystery Boxes.

MOBOX has launched a campaign to give away 80,000 MBOX tokens to KuCoin users in rewards to celebrate listing.

The MOBOX (MBOX) token rose around 14% to US$1.18 in the last 24 hours to 4:32 am ET on Thursday. The price jumped after it was listed on the KuCoin crypto exchange on May 18.

It was scheduled to start trading at 10:00 UTC on May 19 and withdrawals at 10:00 UTC on May 20, 2022. The trading pairs offered in the crypto exchange are MBOX / USDT and MBOX / BTC.

To celebrate the listing, MOBOX launched a campaign to give away 80,000 MBOX tokens to KuCoin users in rewards, amounting to approximately US$88,000.

The carnival campaign is from 10:00 UTC, May 19, 2022, to 10:00 UTC, May 26, 2022.

What is MOBOX?

MOBOX is a gaming platform and metaverse creator. The platform combines DeFi and Gaming NFTs to create a free-to-play GameFi metaverse and play-to-earn ecosystem. Its GameFi metaverse, MOMOverse, is a cross-platform metaverse which can be experienced from various devices. The MOMOverse offers rewards for creating content. It rewards developers, players, and collectors for boosting their engagement.

Also Read: Why is Project Galaxy (GAL) crypto’s campaign drawing attention?

Data Source: coinmarketcap.com

On Thursday morning, the global crypto market was down 3.91% to US$1.23 trillion. Bitcoin (BTC) fell 2.75% to US$28,986.75, and Ethereum (ETH) declined 4.58% to US$1,933.17.

article_title: Bitcoin Price Analysis - BTC Clings Onto $30,000, but Which Way Will the Triangle Break Moving Into the Weekend? - CoinCodex
text:
Bitcoin Price Analysis - BTC Clings Onto $30,000, but Which Way Will the Triangle Break Moving Into the Weekend?

Key highlights:

Bitcoin is up 2.5% today as the bulls try to reclaim the $30,000 level

The number one ranked cryptocurrency continues to trade inside the established range between $31,000 and $28,650 (June 2021 low) this week

A new short-term triangle has formed as we head into the weekend

Bitcoin price $29,800 Key BTC resistance levels $30,500, $31,000 $31,650, $32,000, $32,270 Key BTC support levels $30,000, $29,350, $29,000, $28,650, $28,226

*Price at the time of publication

Bitcoin holders are still on the edge of their seats as they wait for signals that will dictate how the current phase of short-term consolidation will play out. As most of you know, the market took a tumble last week as the number one ranked cryptocurrency fell from above $36,000 to reach as low as $25,485 during the capitulation.

Since then, the buyers have regrouped and have formed a short-term trading range between $31,000 and $28,650 (June 2021 lows). During the week, the market did break beneath a short-term triangle pattern (4hr charts), but the buyers defended the June 2021 lows, allowing the market to rebound above $30,000.

A new triangle has formed on the 4hour charts and will be the next pattern to watch moving into the weekend (see analysis below).

While traders wait for the market to provide an indication of where it would like to head next, the fundamentals continue to remain equally uncertain. With the Fed expected to continue to raise interest rates, and the ongoing fear that the Terra ecosystem collapse caused, it feels like the entire market sentiment is in a dark place.

It seems that whales are continuing to dominate the heavy volatility right now. According to the Exchange Whale Ratio, an indicator that measures the ratio between the sum of the top ten BTC transactions to exchanges against total exchange inflows, it seems that whales continue to dominate the inflows to exchanges.

Typically, a value above 85% means that whales currently make up a large part of the overall exchange inflows. But, as you can see, today’s value is touching the 90% mark - indicating that retail investors are at the whim of the whales right now.

Interestingly, the Bitcoin Accumulation Trend Score from Glassnode suggests that there is still some strong buy-side activity taking place. Last week, when the market collapsed beneath $25,000, the Accumulation Trend Score saw a sharp reversal in which it went from weak values beneath 0.3 to climb back toward 0.796.

When a large proportion of the market is adding to their on-chain balances, the Accumulation Trend Score tends to head back toward 1. This rise in accumulation was the main reason why Bitcoin managed to reclaim $30,000 this week.

Digging deeper, it seems that smaller holders with less than 1 BTC in their wallets were by far the biggest accumulators in the drop

Slightly larger holders helped these small holders with between 1 to 10 BTC in their wallets. The fact that the smaller holders feel comfortable adding to their holdings is a strong bullish signal as they expect that the market dumps might not continue for much longer.

With the market still sitting in uncertain conditions, let us continue to look at where the support is ahead.

Bitcoin price analysis

Daily chart

4-hour chart

What has been going on?

Looking at the daily chart above, we can see that the June 2021 low at $28,650 has been extremely important in preventing further declines this week. However, it is also important to note that Wednesday’s closing candle was lower than the 2022 low-day closing candle, which could be considered a bearish factor moving forward.

Looking at the 4-hour chart, we can see that the market broke the previous triangle (dashed line) but has now formed a slightly longer termed triangle. After breaking beneath the previous triangle, BTC/USD fell into the June 2021 lows but has since rebounded from this level, allowing BTC to maintain itself above $30,000.

Bitcoin price short-term prediction: Bearish

Bitcoin continues to remain bearish in the short term. BTC would need to break and close beneath the January 2021 lows for the bearish pressure to continue further. To be considered neutral again, the coin would need to break back above $35,000 - strong January 2022 support. To be considered bullish, it would have to continue above the May highs at $40,000.

Toward the upside, resistance is first located at the upper angle of the current triangle. This is followed by resistance at $31,000. Additional resistance lies at the June 2021 LDC of $31,650, $32,000 (100-day MA), $32,950, $33,000, $33,520, $34,000, $35,000, and $36,000.

Where is the support beneath $30,000?

On the other side, the first support now lies at $29,850 (50-day MA). This is followed by support at $29,350 (July 2021 lows), $29,000, and $28,650 (June 2021 lows & lower angle of triangle). If the sellers break beneath the triangle, additional support ies expected at $28,225 (downside 1.414 Fib Extension), $28,000, and $27,750 (Jan 2021 lows).

Beneath the January 2021 lows, support is expected at $27,000, $25,885, $25,485 (last week’s low), and $25,000.

So, where are we heading next?

Although the previous short-term triangle broke to the downside, the new triangle provides a little more hope. However, symmetrical triangles typically break in the direction of the previous trend which, in this case, would be bearish.

We would need to wait for a breakout of the current triangle for the market to provide an indication about where it would like to head next. If the current triangle does break, the June 2021 lows and the January 2021 lows would be the next critical support to defend.

Keep up-to-date with the latest Bitcoin Price Predictions on CoinCodex.

article_title: Confio and Interchain Foundation Partners with Composable Finance for Hackathon at Unchained Berlin - CoinCodex
text:
It's the season of blockchain events and hackathons. Composable Finance is partnering with innovative blockchain developing firm Confio and decentralized non-profit Interchain Foundation to present the first-ever cross-chain hackathon, powered by the Composable cross-chain virtual machine (XCVM).

Earlier this month, Composable Finance announced that it would be holding its inaugural cross-chain conference in Berlin, the Unchained Conference. The event, taking place at the Alte Münze on July 1 in Berlin, will feature the following:

Representation of renowned individuals from the DotSama, EVM and Cosmos ecosystems each presenting Keynote speeches.

Panel sessions from web3 industry thought leaders.

The grand unveiling of Composable’s cross-chain virtual machine XCVM.

The Unchained Hackathon where participants get to win up to $10,000 in prizes for building on the XCVM.

How to Participate in the Unchained Demo

Hackathons are a time to birth new products and test new ideas and the limits of an existing product. Hence, participants get up to five hours at the Composable Unchained hackathon to develop innovative solutions that leverage the XCVM.

The hackathon will have representatives from Composable, Confio and Interchain mentoring the participants throughout the event. The teams will be split into Rust and Solidity developers, and UI/UX designers are welcomed as well. At the end of the hackathon, the winning team gets up to $10,000 in prize money after solving various challenges using CosmWasm cross-chain smart contracts they deploy on XCVM.

Attendees of the Unchained conference get to witness not only the unveiling of the XCVM and the birth of new ideas via the hackathon in real-time. Interested participants can come in as a team or sign up as solo participants during the hackathon. In addition, ticket-holders get a chance to experiment with building cross-chain applications on the XCVM after the demo.

If you’re already in Berlin for Polkadot Decoded, why not drop into the Alte Münze on July 1 and hang out while you’re here? The Unchained event is coming up fast. Participants can sign up for the hackathon and secure their tickets here.

article_title: How to Transfer USDT from Coinbase to Bybit? - CoinCodex
text:
Key takeaways:

Coinbase and Bybit are two of the most widely used cryptocurrency exchanges in the sector

Transferring USDT between exchanges provides traders with an opportunity to pursue investment opportunities on different platforms

This guide includes a complete and detailed step-by-step guide on sending USDT from Coinbase to Bybit

How to transfer Tether (USDT) from Coinbase to Bybit?

Cryptocurrency exchange platforms provide different services for users. Some of the services are exclusive to a single exchange. For this reason, users often have to migrate their crypto holdings between different digital asset trading platforms. Coinbase and Bybit are two well-known and secure exchanges, each offering its own set of features. In this article, we will provide you with the full guide showing how to send Tether (USDT) from Coinbase to Bybit.

About Coinbase

Coinbase is the most popular exchange among US cryptocurrency investors. It is the largest digital asset platform based in the US and offers many trading features and a streamlined user interface. Due to its user-friendly approach, Coinbase is especially popular among crypto beginners. However, the company provides an advanced version of the platform as well, called Coinbase Pro, which offers more trading functionality and access to a more extensive selection of cryptocurrencies.

Coinbase Review: Is this Iconic Crypto Exchange Still Good?

Open Coinbase Account

About Bybit

Bybit is a relative newcomer to the crypto scene, having initially launched in 2018. The platform offers various features like spot trading, derivatives products and services, and a wide array of passive income generating features as a part of its Earn platform. Bybit has a global presence, and its easy-to-use desktop and mobile offerings are available in numerous languages. Unfortunately, Bybit doesn't offer its services to users from the United States.

Bybit Review: Leverage and Spot Trading, NFT Marketplace, and more

Open Bybit Account

Step-by-step guide

The process of sending USDT from Coinbase to Bybit is easy to follow and far from being prohibitive to those users that don’t have extensive crypto knowledge. Follow the steps provided in this guide, and you should have no problems moving your crypto holdings between exchanges.

1. Login to your Bybit account and get your USDT deposit address

First, you have to log in to your Bybit account and click on the Deposit option. Navigate to your Tether deposit address. Copy that address or scan the QR code. This is your destination address that will be used when withdrawing from Coinbase.

Make sure that you have selected the appropriate blockchain to transfer USDT on it. The selected chain must be supported by both exchanges. TRC20 is a cheap and fast option for moving Tether, and it is the most popular choice for most users.

The process for web users and app users is a little different. The first two images below show the process for web users, and the latter two are intended for app users.

Desktop client.

Desktop client.

Mobile client.

Mobile client.

The deposits will be done through the spot account. For traders who created their account before July 15, 2021, the deposit will go to the spot account and automatically rerouted to the derivatives account. For accounts created after July 15, 2021, the deposits will be available in the spot account directly. You can change your default deposit settings if you have a preferred deposit destination.

2. Withdraw USDT from Coinbase to your copied Bybit address

Log in to your Coinbase account, and choose the Send/Receive tab.

After selecting the Send/Receive tab, a pop-up will appear. Choose the Send tab on the pop-up, and enter the data into the empty fields. You have to paste your USDT deposit address from Bybit, and you must also insert the exact amount of your withdrawal. Click Send Now and you will be navigated to transaction overview.

3. The deposited USDT should be in your Bybit account

After several network confirmations that could take a up to few minutes to complete, the withdrawn USDT will be deposited to your Bybit account.

Additional considerations

Crypto traders have to transfer assets like USDT between crypto exchanges if they wish to pursue lucrative investment opportunities across different exchanges. Also, different exchanges often have support for different altcoins, which means that transferring funds is the only option to gain exposure to certain altcoins. Other features like staking, lending, and more are also different from one exchange to another.

The process of sending USDT from Coinbase to Bybit is secure as long as you are doing it according to the steps provided in the guide. Make precautionary steps regarding scams like phishing. Be cautious when you copy the deposit address. If you copy the address wrong, you won't get your withdrawn USDT. Pay close attention to the chain that you choose for the transaction--the blockchain option has to be supported by both Bybit and Coinbase exchanges, otherwise, your assets will be lost permanently.

Bottom line

The procedure of moving USDT from Coinbase to Bybit is straightforward, requiring just a bit of attention and precision. Be careful when you copy the deposit address and choose the correct blockchain before withdrawing or depositing funds. Once fully versed in the practice of transferring funds between exchanges, you will be able to take advantage of lucrative investment opportunities on various digital asset platforms. Hopefully, this guide helped you move your USDT between exchanges!

article_title: Apple WWDC 2022: Can You Mine Bitcoin on MacBook M2 Chip? - Coinspeaker
text:
Apple’s annual WorldWide Developers Conference (WWDC) is already here; it begins on Monday, June 6th, and runs through the 10th. In-person attendance will be limited; most participants will do so online. So, what surprises does Apple have in store for us?

Moreover, Apple’s WWDC 2022 event is entirely focused on software and developers. The new versions of Apple’s various operating systems that power its phones, tablets, watches, computers, media players, and possibly other devices should excite everyday users.

However, the main focus of crypto traders is whether the latest hardware and software changes will allow them to mine Bitcoin using the MacBook M2 Chip or IOS16. So, let us find out.

What to Expect at WWDC 2022: M2 Chip & IOS16

Apple’s WWDC 2022 event, as usual, had plenty to choose from, starting with the latest version of Apple’s iPhone operating system, iOS 16, and its latest chip, the M2, to the newest hardware.

That puts it all in (or on) your hands – in this case, the new MacBook Air and MacBook Pro 13. One of the most prominent new features is Safety Check, which is meant to help people in danger of domestic violence.

Key Highlights of the Apple WWDC 2022 Event

At the Worldwide Developers Conference (WWDC) 2022, Apple’s second major annual event, the Cupertino-based company announced a slew of new products, including a software update for its iPhones and the introduction of a buy now, pay later service.

The tech titan unveiled a new car dashboard that will be available in new models from Jaguar and Ford. In addition, Apple also released a slew of collaboration and data security features.

The following are the major product launches made at the event:

MacBook Air and MacBook Pro 13

Apple has redesigned the Air for the first time in ages, with the M2 chip in mind. The new MacBook Air weighs only 2.7 pounds and is 11.3 inches thick. It has a 13.6-inch liquid Retina display and a Magsafe charging system, and a headphone jack is also included.

The MacBook Air will be available in gray, gold, silver, and blue for $1,199, whereas the MacBook Pro starts at $1,299. Both laptops will be available in the coming month. Apple continues to sell the M1 MacBook Air, which starts at $999 and includes a $100 education discount.

iOS 16: Buy Now Pay Later

iOS16, the new version of the iPhone’s operating system, emphasizes customization. That includes a refreshed lock screen with new widgets, increased personalization, and a new approach to notifications.

Further updates to the Wallet include more wireless key partners, such as car manufacturers, as has tap-to-pay on iPhone for contactless payments and Apple Pay Later.

Apple Pay Later allows users to pay with Apple Pay wherever accepted and pay in four installments over six weeks without incurring additional fees.

The iOS will include new CarPlay updates, such as new gauge clusters. Automakers such as Jaguar Land Rover and Ford Motor Company will integrate the feature into their vehicles.

Bitcoin Mining: How do People Earn Money from it?

What is Bitcoin Mining?

Bitcoin mining is the process of creating fresh Bitcoins and putting them into circulation. Through Bitcoin mining, the network confirms recent transactions and is an important part of keeping the blockchain ledger up to date and making it better.

“Mining” is done with sophisticated hardware to solve a complex computational math problem. Therefore, the first computer to solve the problem receives the next block of bitcoins, and the process is restarted.

How to Earn Money with Bitcoin Mining?

The leading cryptocurrency Bitcoin is a “decentralized” cryptocurrency and it does not rely on any central authority, such as a central bank or government, to oversee its regulation because many users worldwide share these responsibilities.

Bitcoin miners receive a reward, an incentive, or a profit in the form of Bitcoin. Miners help with the primary goal of mining: legitimizing and monitoring Bitcoin transactions to ensure their validity. It’s called completing the “block” of verified transactions that are later added to the blockchain.

Can You Mine Bitcoin on MacBook M2 Chip?

With the release of the Apple M2 chipset, cryptocurrency enthusiasts are eager to learn if the M2 chip can be used to mine Bitcoin.

About M2 Chipset

M2 kicks off the second generation of Apple’s M-series chips and expands on the outstanding features of M1. Apple claims that the new chip adds even more performance and capabilities to Apple’s most popular Mac notebooks, the MacBook Air and the 13-inch MacBook Pro, thanks to industry-leading power efficiency, a unified memory architecture, and custom technologies.

This M2 chip helps to improve core processing performance by 18% over the M1 without compromising battery life in the company’s new MacBook Air and 13-inch MacBook Pro laptops.

Can You Mine Bitcoin Use Apple’s M2 Chipset?

The first thing to keep in mind is that you don’t want to be mining in the background using your Macbook or any other windows laptop. The cryptocurrency mining application degrades the machine’s performance for anything else, including casual web browsing, so you should only use the mining app when you’re not using your Mac.

The Apple Macbook M1 chipset produced just over 5Mh/s (mega hash per second), which looks better when considering the total power draw of only 17W. After accounting for electricity costs, a crypto calculator reveals that the profit is only $12.82 per month or approximately 42 cents per day. So if you bought a MacBook Pro solely for mining, it would pay for itself in about 10 years.

Apple’s newly designed central processing units M2 account for the 18% speed increase. Unfortunately, mining Bitcoin using a MacBook Pro M2 chipset won’t be possible.

You will need to purchase mining hardware designed specifically for Bitcoin mining. However, most Bitcoin mining hardware is readily available on Amazon. Bitcoin mining hardware, such as graphics processing units (GPUs), field-programmable gate arrays (FPGAs), and application-specific integrated circuits (ASICs), is critical.

With FPGAs and GPUs, crypto miners can increase mining power by up to 100x while using less power, saving on large electricity bills. Bitcoin mining with anything less powerful will consume more energy than you will likely earn.

Don’t worry, we’ll show you an alternative and less expensive solution to Bitcoin mining, also known as Crypto mining.

Top Alternatives to Mine Bitcoin

Mining Equipment

KuCoin now offers cloud mining, so you don’t have to spend thousands of dollars on Bitcoin mining hardware. Before we get into KuCoin Cloud Mining, let me walk you through the KuCoin Mining Pool.

KuCoin Pool – BTC, BCH & ETH Mining Service

The KuCoin Pool platform strives to provide top-tier cryptocurrency mining services for PoW mining by allowing them to integrate individual hash rate in exchange for a stable and sustainable mining reward. For the past six months, the KuCoin Pool platform has supported BTC, BCH, and ETH mining services in PoW mining.

Key Features of KuCoin Pool

Extremely Low Mining Fee of 2%

Optimized Mining Algorithm.

Customized UX

One-on-One Customer Service.

Top-Notch Risk Control Mechanism

Support Diversified Token Mining

KuCoin Cloud Mining

Cloud Mining is a new remote mining model introduced by KuCoin Pool that allows most users to participate in mining while also contributing to the security of the leading network and earning BTC income.

Now you don’t have to spend hundreds of dollars buying high spec GPUs to participate in mining. Users can mine without buying a mining machine with low costs, ease of operation, and stable access to quality assets.

KuCoin Cloud Mining – To lower the barrier for users to participate in Bitcoin mining, KuCoin Pool introduces Cloud Mining, which is not only labor-saving and simple to use but can also provide a steady income and help you earn BTC easily.

Key Advantages of KuCoin Cloud Mining

Low investment cost and mining threshold

Steady Earnings

Easy to operate

100% Earnings

More efficient Mining

Do you want to learn more about KuCoin cloud mining and how to use it? Check out the complete KuCoin Cloud Mining guide.

Bottom Line

Despite the launch of Apple’s most powerful M2 chipset, Bitcoin mining aka crypto mining isn’t possible. Back in time, it used to be feasible to mine Bitcoin using your computer’s CPU or high-speed graphics cards, but that is no longer the case.

With such a massive rise in mining hardware, particularly application-specific integrated circuit (ASIC) chips designed specifically for Bitcoin mining, the days of digging for digital gold through your desktop PC are long gone.

KuCoin crypto exchange which provide the cloud mining is an excellent option to save you hundreds of dollars on mining machines while still allowing you to profit from Bitcoin mining aka cryptocurrency mining by sharing a fraction of the fee.
